headline: PNC Bank Increases New Branch Openings to More Than 300 by 2030
summary: PNC today announced it will be opening more than 300 new branches by 2030, adding 100 new branches to the expansion plans announced last November and increasing its total branch investment to approximately $2 billion. The additional branches, in markets including Nashville, Chicago, Sarasota and Winston-Salem, extend PNC's expansion efforts to nearly 20 markets across the United States. PNC also re-affirmed its plan to complete the renovation of 100% of its branch network by 2029. In total, by 2
